item.description:

Fixed Templates not working on auto folder monitoring - Templates now process files automatically when theyâ€™re added to monitored folders. Previously, templates only worked when triggered manually but would default to Smart Description for auto-detected files.

ðŸ”§ Improvements

Enhanced Ollama (Local AI) support - Better experience when using local AI models: - Fixed UI flickering when switching between models - Improved detection of vision-capable models (now correctly identifies llava:13b and other vision models) - Clearer guidance about which models support images - Model list now updates reliably when you install or remove models

Cleaner AI settings interface - Removed duplicate status messages and redundant information for a cleaner, more focused settings experience.

Consistent email support - Updated all support contact references to use support@namequick.cc for consistent communication.

This release fixes a critical issue where users configured templates for their managed folders but new files were being processed with Smart Description instead. Auto-processing now correctly respects your template configurations. It also significantly improves the experience for users running local AI models with Ollama.
